dmca.title: Notification of Illegally Uploaded Software - http://www.sharebigfile.com/file/49129/
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: Tyler Cole [mailto:tyler.cole@freelancerpanel.com] 
Sent: Saturday, January 27, 2007 4:38 PM
To: Copyright
Subject: Notification of Illegally Uploaded Software -
http://www.sharebigfile.com/file/49129/FLP.rar.html

To Whom it May Concern:

My name is Tyler Cole and I am the developer and product manager of
Freelancer Panel (http://www.freelancerpanel.com). We have been notified
in good faith that a user has uploaded our software illegally to one of
your client's servers.

I have attempted to contact the owner of "sharebigfile.com". I have
allocated over two weeks for a reply. The owner has neglected to reply
to my notice.

I attempted to send an abuse notice via their "abuse form", which
returned an error - http://www.sharebigfile.com/report.php

I then proceeded to contact them via their "contact form", located at: 
http://www.sharebigfile.com/contact.php, to which no reply has been
given.

I have also just sent an email to the "Registrant" according to the
WHOIS, which had bounced. You will find the bounced email located to the
end of this message.

As you can tell, I have allocated a large amount of time for the owner
to respond to me, and I have even tried various methods to get a hold of
the owner to remove the alleged file, but to no avail. I am hoping The
Planet.com Internet Services, Inc. will be able to assist me in removing
my property which was uploaded illegally.

The illegal file that was uploaded is located at:
http://www.sharebigfile.com/file/49129/FLP.rar.html

In order to prove that I am the rightful owner of this software, you can
download the software. Once you have done that, you can open any ".php" 
file that contains this header:

//  * @pdackage    Freelancer Panel
//  * @license        http://www.freelancerpanel.com/legal-eula/
//  * @copyright    Copyright (c) 2006 Freelancer Panel. All Rights 
Reserved.
//  * @description  Freelancer Panel is software that allows freelancers
to operate much more efficiently. Features include, custom services,
invoices, product management, and much more. It truly is a freelancer's
dream software.
//  * @version       1.0.0
//  * @author        Tyler Cole <tyler.cole@freelancerpanel.com> 
(http://www.freelancerpanel.com)
// You ARE NOT allowed to install the script in a domain or location
other than the licensed domain and location.
// You ARE NOT allowed to REMOVE or MODIFY the copyright code within the
template pages.
// You ARE NOT allowed to REMOVE or MODIFY the copyright text within the
PHP files.
// You ARE NOT allowed to DISTRIBUTE the contents of any of the included
files.
// You ARE NOT allowed to COPY ANY PARTS of the code and/or use it for
distribution.

As you can see, both my name and my email address are listed as the
author.

We have outlined that this user is violating our End User License
Agreement. The EULA is located at
http://www.freelancerpanel.com/legal-eula/

Below is the clause which he is violating:

The End User may NOT sublicense, disassemble, spread, or distribute
copies of the Software to others. The End User may NOT decompile,
reverse engineer, disassemble, or otherwise reduce the Software to a
human readable form. The End User may not modify, adapt, translate,
rent, lease, loan, resell for profit, distribute, or otherwise assign or
transfer the software, or create derivative works based upon the
Software or any part thereof without written consent from Freelance
Panel.

All of the information contained in this notice is accurate.

Please remove the illegal software from your server as soon as possible.

Thank you,

Tyler Cole
Author, Freelancer Panel
tyler.cole@freelancerpanel.com
(+1) (410) 504-1877

This message was created automatically by mail delivery software.

A message that you sent could not be delivered to one or more of its
recipients. This is a permanent error. The following address(es) failed:

  billing@mduhosting.net
    mailbox is full: retry timeout exceeded
